name: REACH CHARITABLE TRUST
briefDescription: RCT is in its infancy and working for illiterates and drop-outs PwD by providing training, creating job opportunities and self-employment. RCT has successfully established shops in Mumbai, Thane and Bharatpur (Raj.) as a Pilot Project. Now we are proposing to provide such services across India. These services will be monitored and assessed on a day to day basis for its progress and self-sustainability. RCT also provides consultancy to set up Vocational Training Centres, Services and Maintenance of Assistive Devices and provide education materials in tactile for visually challenged.
